QuestData.Title: Time is Short
QuestData.Description: Razelikh plans to return to the Blasted Lands and overwhelm Azeroth with his demons. Even now, he is preparing to summon his legions to eliminate us. With these three amulets, we have the method to summon him... but no way to destroy him.$b$b<The gnome quickly draws a rune in the air, then hands it to you.>$b$bDeliver this to Grimeo at the Dark Portal, to the southeast. He will guide you. Quickly! Time is short! And so am I!
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Discordant Rune to Watcher Grimeo at the Dark Portal in the Blasted Lands.
QuestData.RewardText: No, no, no... not Kasim again! This is madness!$b$bPlease, remain quiet. If my commander learns that I still work for the short one, do you know how quickly I will be removed from the watch?$b$b<Grimeo takes the rune from you, presses it to his chest, closes his eyes, and sighs.>$b$bI see you speak the truth. Let us begin our business quickly, so that it may end even quicker.
